name: AllenRax
body: Hello everyone! I'm looking for a demo of the game named X-Hex. The meaning of the game is this. Field rhombuses. On the fields put labels. Thanks to these marks the field grows and becomes bigger. When it begins to touch the opponent’s field. Tags begin run across now to the enemy, then rearward. The winner is the one who fills the entire field. Present bonuses, a call to an aircraft that randomly bombes the enemy’s fields and can hurt yours. Interesting toy. P.S. Thank you in advance You can reply to the mail: judbayneoranderson@gmail.com
